actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide equal benefits, under certain educational assistance programs administered by the Veterans' Administration, to eligible veterans or other eligible persons enrolled in degree courses and eligible veterans or other eligible persons enrolled in nondegree courses offered by fully accredited institutions of higher learning which offer courses leading to a standard college degree and courses not leading to a standard college degree.

summary.text: Provides for equal benefits, under certain educational assistance programs administered by the Veterans Administration, to eligible veterans enrolled in degree courses or enrolled in nondegree courses offered by fully accredited institutions of higher learning which offer courses leading to a standard college degree and courses not leading to a standard college degreee.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide equal benefits, under certain educational assistance programs administered by the Veterans' Administration, to eligible veterans or other eligible persons enrolled in degree courses and eligible veterans or other eligible persons enrolled in nondegree courses offered by fully accredited institutions of higher learning which offer courses leading to a standard college degree and courses not leading to a standard college degree.
